name: Loadstar: The Legend of Tully Bodine
name_original: Loadstar: The Legend of Tully Bodine
description:
Loadstar: The Legend of Tully Bodine is an arcade game developed by Rocket Science Games. It was originally released in 1995. Rocket Science Games published the game.
You can play Loadstar: The Legend of Tully Bodine on PC.
